eu.tivian.musico.net

Class Service.ServiceTask<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<Void,Void,T>
      • eu.tivian.musico.net.Service.ServiceTask<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of object to be returned from the external API.
    Enclosing class:
    Service

    private static class Service.ServiceTask<T>
extends AsyncTask<Void,Void,T>
    Internal class used for asynchronous connection with the external services.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.os.AsyncTask

        AsyncTask.Status

    • Field Detail

      • url

        private String url
        The URL to connect to.

      • connect

        private Function<String,InputStream> connect
        Functor used to connect to the service with proper authorization. Executes outside the UI thread.

      • process

        private Function<JsonReader,T> process
        Functor which processes the input JSON into the desired object denoted by T type. Executes outside the UI thread.

      • action

        private Consumer<T> action
        Functor called after the resource was parsed by the process functor. Executes on the UI thread.

      • onError

        private Consumer<Exception> onError
        Functor called only if any I/O errors occurred while retrieving information from the server. Executes on the UI thread.

      • exception

        private Exception exception
        Used to store any thrown I/O exception.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServiceTask

        private ServiceTask(String url,
                    Function<String,InputStream> connect,
                    Function<JsonReader,T> process,
                    Consumer<T> action,
                    Consumer<Exception> onError)
        Sets every necessary field for the instance of this class.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to connect to.
        connect - functor used to connect to the service with proper authorization.
        process - functor which processes the input JSON into the desired object denoted by T type.
        action - functor called after the resource was parsed by the process functor.
        onError - functor called only if any I/O errors occurred while retrieving information from the server.
